analyzed: ekaviṃśati stotra
namaḥ tāre ture vīre kṣaṇa dyuti nibha īkṣaṇe
trailokya nātha vaktra abja vikasat kesara udbhave
namaḥ śānta sarat candra saṃpūrṇa paṭala ānane
tāre sahasra vikalpa prahasat kiraṇa ujjvale
namaḥ kanaka nīla abja pāṇi padma vibhūṣite
dāna vīrya tapaḥ kṣānti titikṣā dhyāna gocare
namaḥ tathāgata uṣṇīṣa vijaya ananta cāriṇi
aśeṣa pāramitā prāpta jina putra niṣevite
namaḥ tuttāra hūṃkāra pūrita āśā digantare
sapta loka krama ākrāntāḥ aśeṣa ākarṣaṇa kṣaṇe
namaḥ śakra nara brahma marut viśveśvara arcite
bhūta vetāla gandharva gaṇa puraskṛte
namaḥ tra tri tri phaṭkāre para mantra pramardani
pratyālīḍha pāda nyāse śikhi jvālā ākula ujjvale
namaḥ ture mahā ghore māra vīra vināśani
namaḥ triratna mudrā aṅke hṛdya aṅguli vibhūṣite
bhūṣita aśeṣa diś cakra nikare su kulākule
namaḥ pramudita āṭopa mukuṭa ākṣipta sāriṇi
hasat prahasat tuttāre māra loka bhayaṃkari
namaḥ samanta bhūpāla āpātāla ākarṣaṇa kṣaṇe
bhṛkuṭi kṛta hūṃkāre sarva a pada vimocani
namaḥ śikhaṇḍa khaṇḍendu mukuṭa ābharaṇa ujjvale
amita ābha tathā ābhāre bhāsvare kiraṇa dhruve
namaḥ kara tala āghāta caraṇa āhata bhū tale
bhṛkuṭi kṛta hūṃkāra sapta pātāla nāśini
namaḥ kalpānta hutabhuj jvālā mālā antare sthite
ālīḍha mudita ābaddha ripu cakra vināśini
namaḥ śive śubhe śānte śānta nirvāṇa gocare
svāhā praṇamya saṃyukte mahāpātaka nāśini
namaḥ pramudita ābaddha ripu gātra prabhedani
daśa akṣara pāda nyāse vidyā huṃkāra dīpite
namaḥ ture pādāghāte huṃkāra kāra jīvite
namaḥ surāsara ākāra hariṇīka kare sthite
hara dvis ukta phaṭkāra aśeṣa viśa nāśini
namaḥ sura gaṇa yakṣa asura kinnara sevite
ābaddha mudita ābhoga kari duḥsvapna nāśini
namaḥ candra arka saṃpūrṇa nayana dyuti sva bhāsvare
namaḥ tri tala vinyāse śiva śakti samanvite
graha vetāla yakṣa ādi anāśani pravare ture
mantra mūlam idam stotram namaskāra ekaviṃśati

original: yaḥ paṭhet prāyaśo dhīmān devyā bhaktisamanvitaḥ // 1
analyzed: yaḥ paṭhet prāyaśas dhīmān devyāḥ bhakti samanvitaḥ

original: so 'yaṃ vā prātar utthāya smaret sarvābhayapradaṃ /
analyzed: saḥ yam vā prātar utthāya smaret sarva abhaya pradam
asmin mahat tām āsādya

original: viṣaṃ tasya mahāghoraṃ smaraṇāt pralayaṃ yānti // 3
analyzed: viṣam tasya mahā ghoram smaraṇāt pralayam yānti
graha jvala viṣa ārtānām anyeṣām ca eva satvānām
putra kāmaḥ labhet putram sarva kāmān avāpnoti
saptābhiḥ jina koṭibhiḥ saḥ nte bauddha padam vrajet

original: sthāvaraṃ vātha jaṅgamaṃ sāḍ idaṃ pīḍam eva ca // 5
analyzed: sthāvaram vā atha jaṅgamam sāṭ idam pīḍam eva ca

original: dhanakāmo labhed dhanaṃ na vighnaiḥ pratihanyate // 6
analyzed: dhana kāmaḥ labhet dhanam na vighnaiḥ pratihanyate

original: iti śrīsaṃyaksaṃbuddhavairocanabhāṣitaṃ bhagavatyāryatāradevyā namaskāraikaviṃśatistotraṃ saṃpūrṇaṃ samāptaṃ // śubham //
analyzed: iti śrī saṃyak saṃbuddha vairocana bhāṣitam bhagavatyā ārya tāradevyā namaskāra ekaviṃśati stotram saṃpūrṇam samāptam śubham
